page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Our area of Llanelli developed around the steel and tinplate industries but due to the recession,employment trends have changed, with unemployment becoming an increasingly significant factor.Many industries have closed down completely-including the Duport steelworks.1985 has also seen the demise of the Machynys Works and the Llanelli Skill Centre. However, a survey of class J4 in Halway School revealed that 100% of our fathers have full time work.In an area where there is 18% unemployment we consider ourselves fortunate {INDUSTRY(Steelworks and mining)...28% {SERVICES..........................50% {OFFICES...........................22% 88% of our mothers have jobs but half of them only work part-time.Most of them work in the service sector as shop assistants, cleaners etc.
